data.lyric:
[ti:Woman, Amen]
[ar:Dierks Bentley]
[al:Woman, Amen]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Woman, Amen - Dierks Bentley
[00:08.50]Written by：Dierks Bentley/Ross Copperman/Josh Kear
[00:17.01]I'd lose my way yeah I'd lose my mind
[00:20.84]If I faced one day on my own
[00:23.69]
[00:24.80]I know I was saved the night that she gave
[00:28.51]This drifter's heart a home
[00:31.60]
[00:33.01]Every night I should be on my knees
[00:36.93]Lord knows how lucky I am
[00:40.04]
[00:40.99]I'll never say it near enough
[00:44.63]Thank God for this woman amen
[00:47.91]
[00:56.87]This world has a way of shaking your faith
[01:00.53]I've been broken again and again
[01:03.73]
[01:04.43]But I need all the cracks in my shattered heart
[01:08.49]'Cause that's where her love gets in
[01:11.74]
[01:13.02]Every night I should be on my knees
[01:16.89]Lord knows how lucky I am
[01:19.95]
[01:21.00]I'll never say it near enough
[01:24.43]Thank God for this woman amen
[01:28.38]She gives me faith she gives me grace
[01:32.25]She gives me hope she gives me strength
[01:36.30]She gives me love love without end
[01:40.35]Thank God for this woman amen
[01:43.99]
[02:01.19]Thanks for the moon and the stars up above
[02:04.90]Forgiveness of sin and your undying love
[02:08.54]Every twist every turn for the way you made sure
[02:12.69]All my roads led to her
[02:15.53]
[02:16.24]So tonight I will fall down on my knees
[02:20.69]'Cause Lord knows how lucky I am
[02:23.85]
[02:24.98]I'm gonna shout at the top of my lungs
[02:28.64]Thank God for this woman amen
[02:31.94]
[02:32.45]Yeah thank God for this woman amen
[02:36.31]She gives me faith she gives me grace
[02:40.25]She gives me hope she gives me strength
[02:44.42]She gives me love love without end
[02:47.85]
[02:48.46]Thank God for this woman amen
data.trans:
[ti:Woman, Amen]
[ar:Dierks Bentley]
[al:Woman, Amen]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:08.50]//
[00:17.01]我将迷失方向 我将丧失理智
[00:20.84]如果有一天我孤立无援
[00:23.69]
[00:24.80]我知道那晚是她拯救了我
[00:28.51]给我这个漂泊者一个家
[00:31.60]
[00:33.01]每个夜晚我都会虔诚祈祷
[00:36.93]只有上帝知道我有多幸运
[00:40.04]
[00:40.99]我从没有这么近距离地表达过我的心声
[00:44.63]感谢上帝将她送到我身边 阿门
[00:47.91]
[00:56.87]这个世界会动摇你的信念
[01:00.53]我曾一次又一次遭受打击
[01:03.73]
[01:04.43]纵使心被伤得支离破碎 我也需要一点缝隙
[01:08.49]这样她的爱就能照进我的心房
[01:11.74]
[01:13.02]每个夜晚我都会虔诚祈祷
[01:16.89]只有上帝知道我有多幸运
[01:19.95]
[01:21.00]我从没有这么近距离地表达过我的心声
[01:24.43]感谢上帝将她送到我身边 阿门
[01:28.38]她给予我信念 她给予我恩典
[01:32.25]她给予我希望 她给予我力量
[01:36.30]她给予我爱 无止尽的爱
[01:40.35]感谢上帝将她送到我身边 阿门
[01:43.99]
[02:01.19]感谢月亮 感谢星辰
[02:04.90]宽恕罪恶 你永恒的爱围绕着我
[02:08.54]尽管我脚下的路曲曲折折
[02:12.69]最终都通向她所在的地方
[02:15.53]
[02:16.24]每个夜晚我都会虔诚祈祷
[02:20.69]只有上帝知道我有多幸运
[02:23.85]
[02:24.98]我将竭尽全力呼喊
[02:28.64]感谢上帝将她送到我身边 阿门
[02:31.94]
[02:32.45]感谢上帝将她送到我身边 阿门
[02:36.31]她给予我信念 她给予我恩典
[02:40.25]她给予我希望 她给予我力量
[02:44.42]她给予我爱 无止尽的爱
[02:47.85]
[02:48.46]感谢上帝将她送到我身边 阿门
